infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) uses camera to allow you to capture a photo of your location/menu/product/service
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) optionally marks your location using your geo coordinates so that clients/customers can find you
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) optionally marks your location using your geo coordinates so that clients/customers can find you
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: EasyGO (Business) optionally marks your location using your geo coordinates so that clients/customers can find you
